name: Halloween Survival
description:
The enemies will revive, and stronger!

How long can you survive?

Controls:

left click -- select.

right click -- cancel the selection of the current character.

w, s, a, d -- scroll game view.

Icon meanings:

-- health point (HP)          -- attack (ATT)

 -- defence (DEF)                -- movement points (MOV)

 -- candy                                   -- action points (AP)

Developed by Sween Zhou.

(If the web version lags, you can download the game from below for Windows or Mac)
